Title: Civil Wrongs
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Mike O'Malley
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona's life is finally going great - until Jimmy tells her he might go back to med school...in Michigan. As the new star of gay rights, Frank is lured to the other side.
